Falas.Intro:
Hello, there! 
Glad to meet you! [/page]Welcome to the world of POKEMON! [/page]My name is OAK. [/page]People affectionately refer to me as the POKéMON PROFESSOR. [/page]This world... [/page]...is inhabited far and wide by creatures called POKéMON. [/page]For some people, POKéMON are pets. 
Others use them for battling. [/page]As for myself... [/page]I study POKéMON as a profession. [/page]But first, tell me a little about yourself.
